statements: DELETE FROM adherence_reports WHERE audit_type = 'Monthly Audit';
DELETE FROM adherence_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND audit_type = 'Detailed';
DELETE FROM adherence_reports WHERE audit_date < '2022-01-01' AND adherence_score <= 0.5;
DELETE FROM AuditReports WHERE audit_type = 'Internal' AND auditor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM external_audit_records WHERE report_submitted = true;
DELETE FROM external_audit_reports WHERE report_name = 'Quarterly Financial Audit';
DELETE FROM internal_audit_reports WHERE report_name = 'Quarterly Report';
